Entries from October 2002

A Winter Haunting

October 27th, 2002 · No Comments

Just in time for Halloween, I finished Dan Simmons’ new book A Winter Haunting. I’m happy to say the faults I found in the characterization of the protagonist in his last book, Hardcase, are not present in this one. Overall it’s a good ghost story.

[Read more →]

October 26th, 2002 · No Comments

Some scary news. I got home today to find my house broken into by an evil Power Ranger. I had just enough time to get a snapshot of her before she ran off. Check it out here.

Fancy new log system

October 25th, 2002 · No Comments

I decided to give up on the blog written in vi and get some decent software to handle the HTML automatically for me. Introducing mike’s fancy new logging system, courtesy of the fine folks at Movable Type. BTW, the old log is still archived here.

Halloween

October 25th, 2002 · 1 Comment

Bought some halloween candy to give out to the kids. I got the most foul, wretched tasting candy I could find. That’ll teach ‘em to come to old man Perham’s place!
